lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: Over the last thirty years or so, micro finance has proven to be the best tool we have at reducing extreme poverty. Extreme poverty and environmental degradation are the two biggest problems currently facing mankind. While micro finance on its own may not eliminate poverty, it has, and will continue to go a long way towards mitigating the problem, and in turn help prevent some of the environmental degradation overpopulation is causing.
lender.occupational_info: I get paid to have fun with computers.

lender.name: JCDU
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone. :)
lender.occupational_info:
I am a student in high school, and I felt like helping some people across the world. I know I have never met them, but I wish they could be in my shoes right now. All these third world countries are suffering because of the first world ones. Huge corporations take over much of the land in the third world countries, and they take alot and give back less. So I think it's partly my fault for living so well. Just thinking my well-livingis the cause of people in other countries to suffer, I cannot live on that fact. I wish I could help them in some way, but I'm only a student, with very little funds and power. The best I can do is help someone through Kiva for now, right?
This site is an awesome idea. I love how you get the money back from the entrepreneurs and you are able to loan again!
Thanks for an awesome experience Kiva.org!

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: "In helping others, we shall help ourselves, for whatever good we give out completes the circle and comes back to us." - Flora Edwards

lender.loan_because: I come from the "land of plenty", so this is one of my ways of giving something back.

lender.name: Mario
lender.loan_because: I want to help people
lender.occupational_info: It¬¥s could be better

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: I've been fortunate to travel to some great places and meet some great people and it's nice knowing that I've been able to help out some of the people there.
lender.occupational_info: I teach and research in a business school, specifically dealing with using computers and supplier collaborations to improve businesses.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: Lending feels better to me than donating. Both lender and borrower can feel proud of the transaction.
lender.occupational_info: I buy and sell telecommunications services.

lender.name: Cody
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I am a university student studying math and biology hoping to one day become a teacher.

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: I would like to support the desires and efforts of others to increase the quality of their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I help people who want to sell their homes and also people who want to buy a home. I live in a beautiful area and love my work.

lender.name: Maureen
lender.loan_because: The world should be seen as one very large family.
lender.occupational_info: I work in collegiate recreational sports -- providing opportunities for students, faculty and staff to live active and balanced lives.

lender.name: Mary Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I like to help entrepreneurs in developing countries...especially women with children.
lender.occupational_info: I design shoes for various clients...I work from home and sometimes I travel to factories to collaborate with sample makers.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: This type of support for one person or organization has the potential to positively impact many others.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the field of collegiate recreational sports promoting balance and healthy lifestyles as well as lifelong learning.

lender.name: Lorri
lender.loan_because: I would rather offer a hand up than a handout.

lender.name: Julian
lender.loan_because: To help improve the lives of others, and give a chance to someone wanting to help themselves.

lender.name: Mrs. Ray
lender.loan_because: My students and I are looking for ways to think and act globally

lender.name: Justin & Kate
lender.loan_because: God has blessed us with more than we could ever ask for. During a recent trip to Uganda while adopting our child we were convicted to try to help the people of Uganda and Africa anyway possible.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping others - especially those who need the help but those also who are willing to "have a go" at supporting themselves regardless of how poor they are. This little bit of support hopefully one day will multiple for them and they in turn can then help others of their own to get ahead in life.
lender.occupational_info: I am a law enforcement officer in a small rural township in Western Queensland Australia. I live in a town that is also remote and "poor" or disadvantaged by some Australian standards and has many natural hardships. ie climate, remoteness to facilities and services, drought, and declining rural population.

lender.name: Roy
lender.loan_because: It takes one person's commitment for change to start a process of continuous and sustainable progress in the lives of others.Everything in nature survives for the existence of others.

lender.name: Jared
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: Lifestyle Entrepreneur.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: As business owners, we have relied on loans to start and expand our business. Seems only fair to lend to someone else when I have the means.
lender.occupational_info: we grow trees in greenhouses mostly for reforestation and conservation

lender.name: Joelle
lender.loan_because: We are all neighbors! It doesn't matter where we come from!

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: If I was in a situation like many of these people, I hope someone would help me provide for my family.

lender.name: M Skaffari
lender.loan_because: World would be so much better place if everybody who could help others did so.

lender.name: Danielle
lender.loan_because: it matters
lender.occupational_info: learning

lender.name: Merck
lender.loan_because: The following is a registered trademark of Merck & Co. Inc. (NYSE:MRK) for more information please visit http://www.merck.com
lender.occupational_info: The following is a registered trademark of Merck & Co. Inc. (NYSE:MRK) for more information please visit http://www.merck.com

lender.name: Dana
lender.loan_because: We are so privileged, even in the worst of times here, our few dollars can go so far in another place to help entrepreneurs who can then change their world.
lender.occupational_info: I am an attorney, entrepreneur, investor, public speaker. I am a father, husband, and friend.

lender.name: Hardy
lender.loan_because: Helping other people fulfill their dreams and goals is something I feel passionate about.

lender.name: GPC Perpetual Fund
lender.occupational_info: The Global Poverty Club of Elmhurst College Perputual Fund is a non-withdrawable account that only uses repaid loans to reinvest as additional future loans. We are excited to have to the ability to make a difference in other's lives indefinitely.
